description:
Wacom Tablet Driver Software


- This driver supports the new Wacom One 14.
- The ExpressKey Remote (EKR-100) and Mobile Studio Pro (DTH-W1320, DTH-W1620, DTH-W1321, DTH-W1621) are now fully supported in Wacom Center.
- We improved and updated the touch size handling to make it more consistent with previous drivers.
- Please note that this driver no longer supports the products listed below. For the latest driver that supports these products, download and install the 6.4.10-3 driver.
  IntuosCTL-490, CTL-690, CTH-490, CTH-690
  Intuos ProPTH-451, PTH-651, PTH-851
  Cintiq 13DTK-1300, DTH-1300
  Cintiq 22DTK-2200, DTH-2200
  Cintiq 27DTK-2700, DTH-2700
  N/ADTK-1651, DTU-1031X, DTU-1141
